Traits.Name: Explosive End
Traits.Description: When the Pinhead is defeated, it explodes in a blast 1 area effect that deals physical light damage and inflicts poisoned.

Actions.Name: Place Bomb
Actions.Description: The Pinhead places a size 1 summon in a space in range 3. At the start of the Pinheadâ€™s next turn or if the bomb takes any damage, the bomb explodes in a blast 1 area effect that deals physical heavy damage and inflicts poisoned.
